title: Karrueche Tran reveals her abs in a flirty crop top while Draya Michele opts for a one-piece in LA
text:
She's taken her talents from modeling to acting with a growing resume of gigs.

And Karrueche Tran flaunted her incredible physique while on a girls' night with Dray Michele in Los Angeles on Thursday.

The 31-year-old stunner rocked a flirty crop top paired with high-waisted jeans as she joined her gal pal for a night of drinks and dancing at celeb hot-spot Delilah.

Friends! Karrueche Tran flaunted her incredible physique while on a girls' night with Dray Michele in Los Angeles on Thursday

Karrueche was dressed to thrill wearing a burnt orange blouse with billowing sleeves and a matching ribbon tied below her bust to reveal her toned torso.

She emphasized her svelte waistline with a pair of black slacks which were laced up above her belly button.

The Claws star added inches to her petite frame with a pair of strappy black sandals and carried a darling Louis Vuitton purse in one hand with the brand's signature moniker splashed across the bag.

So chic: The 31-year-old stunner rocked a flirty crop top paired with high-waisted jeans as she joined her gal pal for a night of drinks and dancing at celeb hot-spot Delilah

Cute: Karrueche was dressed to thrill wearing a burnt orange blouse with billowing sleeves and a matching ribbon tied below her bust to reveal her toned torso

She wore her silky brunette tresses partially curled to frame her face and sported a pair of gold hoop earrings.

Draya was ready for a wild night out wearing a tight black one-piece which were fashioned into shorts and featured a plunging neckline.

She kept her shoulders covered with a black leather jacket and added pops of color with a wild pair of thigh-grazing boots.

Beauty: The Claws star added inches to her petite frame with a pair of strappy black sandals and carried a darling Louis Vuitton purse in one hand with the brand's signature moniker splashed across the bag

Festive: Draya was ready for a wild night out wearing a tight black one-piece which were fashioned into shorts and featured a plunging neckline

The 34-year-old reality star slicked back her brunette hair into a tight bun and wore diamond studded earrings.

In an interesting nod to both of their pasts, Draya and Karrueche previously dated Chris Brown.

While Draya's time with Chris seemed to end somewhat amicably, Karrueche has a five-year restraining order against the rapper.
description: The 31-year-old stunner rocked a flirty crop top paired with high-waisted jeans as she joined her gal pal for a night of drinks and dancing at celeb hot-spot Delilah.
